column1: Baby Barnaby's////I subtracted a star because when I went in last time the bench had skewed up to a table
column2: and as I was trying to correct it the waitress yelled from across (the admittedly small) room
column5: if you need more room sit over there
column6: which I internalized to mean that I am slightly larger than Jabba the Hut and I should sit outside so that my weight doesn't collapse the Resteraunt.
